titleStmt.title: The Fryer well-fitted. Or, A pretty j[e]st that once befell, how a maid put a fryer to cool in the well. To a pretty tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: For F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Letter in title did not print.
Caption of second sheet reads: The second part, to the smae [sic] tune.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
